Title: Relates to prohibiting state funding of any college if instructional staff advocates or engages in activities on campus in support of a terrorist organization
Summary: Prohibits state funding of any college if instructional staff promotes, encourages, advocates or engages in activities on campus in support of a terrorist organization as defined in federal statute.
LawCode: Add Art 13-D ยง641, Ed L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to prohibiting state funding of any college if such institution's instructional staff advocates or engages in activities on campus in support of a terrorist organization
